  • Expanding the Sun-Times Brand Nationwide
    12 Dec 2014

    You will need one default image for jekyll to use in case the post does not have the thumbnail property. Just pick the one you like and put it somewhere in your web directory. For example, I put the image named nothumbnail.jpg in the images folder in the root directory of my site.

Hello!

This website focuses on long-form writings on past projects, as well as insight into personally & professionally-significant material. You can view my unabridged portfolio on Behance, latest WIP's on Dribbble, updates on Twitter / Instagram, and my projects on Github.
